title: A Simple Linear Regression
author: CHANGED
---

CHANGED!! We build a linear regression below.

```{r}
fit = lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)
b = coef(summary(fit))
plot(fit)
```

The slope of the regression is `r b[2, 1]`.
